short_en: Advanced face recognition with anti-spoofing and temperature detection.
short_id: Pengenalan wajah canggih dengan deteksi suhu dan anti-spoofing.
desc_en: A professional face recognition terminal supporting high accuracy under diverse lighting. Features infrared and temperature sensors.
desc_id: Terminal pengenalan wajah profesional dengan akurasi tinggi di berbagai kondisi cahaya, dilengkapi sensor inframerah dan suhu.
